post_text: March 25, 2017 at 6:50â€¯PM#1Hello dear MA usersI have a Macro Question...I'd like to create a macro that creates an almost identical macro to the one on the previous macro number but updates some numbers in the syntax/command linesfor examplemacro 1line1: gotocue 1 executor 50.146line 2: copy $uservar at $uservar /oline 3: copy image 66 at image 98 /oline 4: $uservar at $ uservar /othe next macro should beline1: gotocue 2 executor 50.146line 2: copy $uservar at $uservar /oline 3: copy image 67 at image 99 /oline 4: $uservar at $ uservar /othe only variables changing are the cue number in line 1 and the images numbers in line 3 (basically they add 1 with every new macro)Any thoughts, i've been staring at it too long now.Thank you for your help!
title: Macro to create identical macro but with some variables ???
